name: Adventure Of Keoma
description:
Dive into an unforgettable adventure in a cave world where something monstrous is taking place, will you find your lost daughter or will you get lost too?

Armed with your staff and your book of spells, you will enter an endless number of caves. Find the keys to open the doors and discover the path that will lead you to your destination.

Search every corner and eliminate all the monsters you encounter,

but most importantly...

Return home to your wife and daughter!

The controls are simple

AD/left and right Arrow keys to Move

Space to Jump

This game was created by Koko and Maria, two computer science students from Reus/Spain.

We used our own assets and the background music is in 8-bit for more enjoyment of the game.

Developers :

   

Maria

    

Koko

We hope you like our game !!!
